attributes.action: take action against the Taliban in Pakistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our current counterinsurgency campaign in Afghanistan is completely pointless if the Taliban are not defeated but merely moved to pakistan. Also, as the taliban strengthen themselves in Pakistan, it becomes more difficult to defeat them in Afghanistan.
The Taliban must be defeated in Pakistan and soon, otherwise £billions and hundreds of lives will have been spent in vain.
